info.name: @AddonBar & StatusBar - Compact (Icon & Font)
info.description: This style sheet makes add-on/status bar font-size small & Toolbar's icons slim, optimized for "Status-4-Evar" add-on.
info.additionalInfo:
=============== Change Log ===============
Jul 24, 2014: Commented out old css which I no longer use, preparing to eliminate
Jul 22, 2014: Added support for Status-4-Evar
Sep 24, 2013: Added a comment to meet global style criteria by Stylish described at https://github.com/JasonBarnabe/stylish/wiki/Preventing-global-styles
May 30, 2011: Additional CSS selectors for UploadProgress on the Add-on bar.
Apr 28, 2011: Restrict the width adjustment only to addon-bar.
Apr 27, 2011: Widen too narrow dropmarkers.
Apr 26, 2011: Eliminate useless StatusbarEx logo icon.
Apr 07, 2011: Update for FF4.
Mar 31, 2011: Widen link preview pop-up (FF4 default:50%) when a mouse pointer hovers over the link.
Mar 29, 2011: Minor adjustment to kill redundant selectors.
Nov 26, 2010: Change font color for "UploadProgress".
Nov 18, 2010: Change name.
Nov 18, 2010: Eliminate XUL limitation.
Nov 18, 2010: Eliminate UploadProgress progress bar.
Nov 18, 2010: Eliminate Ad Hacker icon.
Apr 18, 2009: Eliminate Wappalyzer icon.
